price: 79. Ee isku hallee oo talo saaro Alle; hubaal, waxaad ku taagan tahay Xaq Cad.
arabic: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innaka ʿalā al-ḥaqi al-mubīni
